devdoc.details: Only Controller has access and should implement time-lock for upgrade action.

Upgraded(address).details: Emitted when the implementation is upgraded.

upgrade(address).details: Upgrade allowed only for Controller and should be done only after time-lock period

PROXY_CONTROLLED_VERSION.details: Should be incremented when contract changed

devdoc.title: EIP1967 Upgradable proxy implementation.
